content: Dear Dataverse Community, I've been asked to coordinate a day-long hackathon at the end of the 2025 Dataverse Community Meeting in Chapel Hill, on June 13th 2025. I've created a "DCM2025 Hackathon" label for GitHub issues, and welcome proposed hackathon work tagged in this way.

I propose this one: API Guide: Typo in "get citation for dataset" API docs #10257

It doesn't involve changing any code but ideally the API endpoint would be tested with curl or whatever to make sure the docs are otherwise correct.
Some nice chatter about this in the container meeting a couple hours ago: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CJG249DQypMXx2eEa0aAa8fPtFHz2qSia6C3ErRCrgM/edit?usp=sharing
I just marked this one for the hackathon: directoryLabel (file path) missing from getDatasetFileDetails from ExportDataProviderÂ #10523
I just added this one: "Tips for Dataverse metadata" document is emptyÂ #11231
I thought the hackathon went pretty well! Interesting conversations. Some good hacking.
